title: Dirac series of U(n,2)
authors: Lin Wei, Chengyu Du, Hongfeng Zhang, Xuanchen Zhao
abstract:
We determine the Dirac series of $U(n,2)$ and give related information about
Dirac series: the spin lowest $K$-types are multiplicity free, and the Dirac
cohomology are consistent with the Dirac index.
